    Mechanical Engineering

    Mechanical Engineer – HVAC & Maintenance

    Full-time
    On-site

    About This Role

    ERA is looking for a mechanical engineering professional with experience or strong interest in HVAC systems, plumbing installations, and mechanical maintenance for commercial and residential projects.

    Responsibilities

    • • Design, install, and maintain HVAC and mechanical systems on project sites
    • • Prepare technical reports and as-built documentation
    • • Coordinate with civil and electrical teams on project integration
    • • Troubleshoot mechanical failures and propose cost-effective solutions
    • • Ensure all mechanical work complies with relevant Nigerian standards

    Requirements

    • • B.Eng / B.Sc in Mechanical Engineering
    • • 1–3 years of relevant industry experience preferred
    • • Familiarity with HVAC systems, pumps, and piping layouts
    • • Proficiency in technical drawing interpretation
    • • Good communication and teamwork skills

    What You'll Gain

    • ✓ Exposure to diverse project types across residential and commercial sectors
    • ✓ Mentorship from experienced mechanical engineers
    • ✓ Competitive compensation package
    • ✓ Pathway to ERA partner company placement

    How to Apply

    Send your CV to info@era.com.ng with subject: Application – Mechanical Engineer HVAC

    Apply via Email →
